versos: (west) Isaiah 45:6 - "So that from the rising of the sun to the place of its setting people may know there is none besides me. I am the Lord, and there is no other.";;;

(prince) Ezekiel 45:8 - "This will be his land as a possession in Israel. And my princes will no longer oppress my people; they will allow the people of Israel to possess the land according to their tribes.";;;
(east) Genesis 4:16 - "So Cain went out from the Lords presence and lived in the land of Nod, east of Eden.";;;

(north) Isaiah 14:13 - "You said in your heart, I will ascend to the heavens; I will raise my throne above the stars of God; I will sit enthroned on the mount of assembly, on the utmost heights of Mount Zaphon.'";;;
(infinite) Psalm 147:5 - "Great is our Lord and abundant in strength; His understanding is infinite.";;;
(stream) Ezekiel 32:6 - I will drench the land with the streams of your blood all the way to the mountains
(needs) Philippians 4:19 - "And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.";;;
(moved) Psalm 16:8 - I have set the Lord always before me; because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.;;;
(evidence) Hebrews 11:1 - "Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.";;;
(judgment) Matthew 7:1-2 - "Do not judge, or you too will be judged. For in the same way you judge others, you will be judged, and with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.";;;
(bound) Hebrews 13:3 - "Remember those who are in prison, as though in prison with them, and those who are mistreated, since you also are in the body.";;;
(debt) Romans 13:8 - "Let no debt remain outstanding, except the continuing debt to love one another, for whoever loves others has fulfilled the law.";;;
(embraced) Psalm 73:23 - "Yet I am always with you; you hold me by my right hand.";;;
(godly) Psalm 4:3 - "Know that the Lord has set apart his faithful servant for himself; the Lord hears when I call to him.";;;
(lepers) Luke 17:12 - "And as he entered into a certain village, there met him ten men that were lepers, which stood afar off.";;;
(ethiopia) Isaiah 18:1 - "Woe to the land shadowing with wings, which is beyond the rivers of ethiopia";;;
(timothy) Philippians 1:1 - "Paul and timothy, servants of Christ Jesus, To all the saints in Christ Jesus at Philippi, together with the overseers and deacons:";;;
(might) Judges 13:23 - But his wife said to him
